# Newport Pembury & Co
> Fractional CFO advisory for founders scaling $5M to $50M. Sydney, Australia. M&A advisory, cash flow strategy, systems transformation.

## About
- [About](https://newportpembury.com.au/about): Meet Timothy Messieh, Director & Fractional CFO. Chartered Accountant with 20 years experience.

## Services
- [Services](https://newportpembury.com.au/services): M&A advisory, cash flow & financial strategy, systems & digital transformation, strategic CFO partnership.

## Insights
- [Insights](https://newportpembury.com.au/insights/): Articles and analysis on M&A, financial strategy, and business growth.
- [M&A Readiness Checklist](https://newportpembury.com.au/insights/ma-readiness-checklist/): Why 70% of deals destroy value and how to prepare.

## Contact
